message: maybe you could sell books, videos, audio CDs are related to the organization you live
If you give me more info i may be able to help, but no promises :)

Have you looked to see if anyone is running a non-profit in the same subject area, already legally established, and is just not doing the program you want? There are lots of hurdles to creating new non profits, but few to getting funding for a new area if there's an existing organization. As background, I ran the operations of the $216MM Twin Towers Fund after 9-11. I teach intro to Social Media at the Center for Philanthropy and Fundraising at NYU.

The organization is www.alphaonelabs.com - we're on convore too https://convore.com/join/ALPHA1/ we do sell electronic kits and DVDs - We'd like to get funding for the space in general and for specific projects
